name: brawlHavenObjects
description:
Modified Haven Town objects used by template Brawl, should be better suited for short games on small maps.
Pirate Keep:
30% chance, 5x 3 Arbalists, reward: 1500 Gold, 9 Wood, 2 Treasure Artifacts
40% chance, 5x 4 Arbalists, reward: 2000 Gold, 12 Wood, Treasure Artifact, Minor Artifact
30% chance, 5x 5 Arbalists, reward: 2500 Gold, 15 Wood, 2 Minor Artifacts
50% chance to get twice more Artifacts but lose Gold and Wood instead of gaining it
All creatures that have upgrades, both guards and rewards have a chance of being upgraded.
All banks recharge after 4 full days pass.
They are not designed to be taken with your whole army but with parts of your army in multiple places at once.
author: Warzyw647

chinese.name: Brawl模板峡湾城镇小物件
chinese.description:
专为Brawl模板定制的改良版峡湾城镇物件，适用于小型地图。
海盗要塞：
30%的几率，出现5组，每组3名赏金猎人，奖励：1500金币，9单位木材，2件低级宝物
40%的几率，出现5组，每组4名赏金猎人，奖励：2000金币，12单位木材，1件低级宝物，1件中级宝物
30%的几率，出现5组，每组5名赏金猎人，奖励：2500金币，15单位木材，2件中级宝物
无论是何种守卫，该宝屋均有50%的几率获得双倍宝物，但会失去金币和木材，而不是获得它们
所有可升级的生物，无论是守卫还是奖励生物，都可能出现升级后的生物。
所有宝屋每4天刷新一次。
这些物件不是设计来让你用全部兵力去攻打的，而是让你分散成多支小股部队同时攻打多处地点。
